description: The NeonImageCarousel is used to display a carousel of images for the user to swipe through. NOTE: It is recommended to explicitly set the width & height of the carousel via CSS, this will ensure it will not be impacted by images with different aspect ratios. Images are automatically resized to fit the carousel dimensions.

props.name: images
props.description: The images to be displayed in the carousel.

props.name: imageCountLabel
props.description: Provide an alternative image count label. This can be useful for translations. The default is e.g. 2 images.

props.name: hideLabel
props.description: Hide the label under the dot navigation.

props.name: closeLabel
props.description: Provide an alternative label for the Previous button.

props.name: previousLabel
props.description: Provide an alternative label for the Previous button.

props.name: nextLabel
props.description: Provide an alternative label for the Next button.

events.name: current-image
events.description: The index of the currently visible image.
